column4: I feel dumb asking but, how does one lets say, remove some of the apps under sound & video menu, (i have alot as i installed the ubustu packages, some of the apps dont work with my sound card and I would like to remove a couple and or reposition them)
thats ok, thanks, i just changed it to "installed applications"
second question, I cant seem to get ubuntu when i log in to remember my display resolution, it is being set by the nvidia server settings util
